incidents.name: Sys:AII GKE Loophole

incidents.name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities (Azure HDInsight: The Sequel - Unveiling 3 New Vulnerabilities That Could Have Led to Privilege Escalations and Denial of Service)
incidents.report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
incidents.involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka
incidents.notes: HDInsight doesn't support in-place upgrades so users must create a new cluster with the desired component and latest platform version that includes the security updates. Next, they should migrate their applications to use the new cluster.

incidents.name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #1: Azure HDInsight Apache Oozie Workflow Scheduler XXE Elevation of Privileges
incidents.report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
incidents.involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Oozie; Hadoop
incidents.notes: vulnerability that allowed for root-level file reading and privilege escalation from low-privilege users. The vulnerability was caused through lack of proper user input validation

MITRE_Techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Web Service: Exfiltration Over Webhook

incidents.name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #2: Azure HDInsight Apache Ambari JDBC Injection Elevation of Privileges
incidents.report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security

incidents.name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #3: Azure HDInsight Apache Oozie Regex Denial Of Service via vulnerable parameter
incidents.report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
incidents.involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Oozie; Hadoop (Hadoop Cluster); Oozie dashboard, hosts, and jobs
incidents.notes: Due to the lack of proper input validation and constraint enforcement, an attacker can request a large range of action IDs. This causes an intensive loop operation within the system, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability
incidents.vulnerability_type: Lack of input validation and constraint enforcement

MITRE_Techniques.name: Endpoint Denial of Service: Application or System Exploitation
